action.action-desc: Mr. Green of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To mandate certain hours for in-person branch offices of depository institutions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Original Open for Business Act of 2023.

subsection.text: Beginning on the date that is 180 days after the date of the enactment of this section, each branch location of a depository institution with in-person customer service shall remain open for business (except on a Federal holiday)â€”

paragraph.text: until 7 p.m. on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, or Friday; and
for a minimum of 4 hours on Saturday.

subsection.text: In this section, the term depository institution shall have the meaning given the term in section 3 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act.
